title: T206 FORD with a Polar Bear back wanted
author: ginter

posts.post_title: T206 FORD with a Polar Bear back wanted
posts.post_content: Anyone have a T206 FORD with a Polar Bear back in PSA 3 or 4 / SGC 40 or 50 (or even a raw vg-ex) for sale? Please email me with a price and a scan, if you have one. Many thanks!
